問題描述: 主機上的服務支援使用SSLv2或SSLv3進行加密連線。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:443。
建議解決方式: 建議變更相關網路服務設定值，使加密連線僅允許支援TLS 1.2以上。
Name: SSL Version 2 and 3 Protocol Detection
Synopsis:
The remote service encrypts traffic using a protocol with known
weaknesses.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using SSL 2.0 and/or
SSL 3.0. These versions of SSL are affected by several cryptographic
flaws, including:

  - An insecure padding scheme with CBC ciphers.

  - Insecure session renegotiation and resumption schemes.

An attacker can exploit these flaws to conduct man-in-the-middle
attacks or to decrypt communications between the affected service and
clients.

Although SSL/TLS has a secure means for choosing the highest supported
version of the protocol (so that these versions will be used only if
the client or server support nothing better), many web browsers
implement this in an unsafe way that allows an attacker to downgrade
a connection (such as in POODLE). Therefore, it is recommended that
these protocols be disabled entirely.

NIST has determined that SSL 3.0 is no longer acceptable for secure
communications. As of the date of enforcement found in PCI DSS v3.1,
any version of SSL will not meet the PCI SSC's definition of 'strong
cryptography'.
Solution:
Consult the application's documentation to disable SSL 2.0 and 3.0.
Use TLS 1.2 (with approved cipher suites) or higher instead.
Plugin Output:
- SSLv3 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.
	Explanation: TLS 1.0 and SSL 3.0 cipher suites may be used with SSLv3


  Medium Strength Ciphers (> 64-bit and < 112-bit key, or 3DES)

    Name                          Code             KEX           Auth     Encryption             MAC
    ----------------------        ----------       ---           ----     ---------------------  ---
    EDH-RSA-DES-CBC3-SHA                           DH            RSA      3DES-CBC(168)          SHA1
    DES-CBC3-SHA                                   RSA           RSA      3DES-CBC(168)          SHA1

  High Strength Ciphers (>= 112-bit key)

    Name                          Code             KEX           Auth     Encryption             MAC
    ----------------------        ----------       ---           ----     ---------------------  ---
    DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA                             DH            RSA      AES-CBC(128)           SHA1
    DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA                             DH            RSA      AES-CBC(256)           SHA1
    AES128-SHA                                     RSA           RSA      AES-CBC(128)           SHA1
    AES256-SHA                                     RSA           RSA      AES-CBC(256)           SHA1
    DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256                          DH            RSA      AES-CBC(128)           SHA256
    DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256                          DH            RSA      AES-CBC(256)           SHA256
    RSA-AES128-SHA256                              RSA           RSA      AES-CBC(128)           SHA256
    RSA-AES256-SHA256                              RSA           RSA      AES-CBC(256)           SHA256

The fields above are :

  {Tenable ciphername}
  {Cipher ID code}
  Kex={key exchange}
  Auth={authentication}
  Encrypt={symmetric encryption method}
  MAC={message authentication code}
  {export flag}

問題描述: 裝置上的SNMP伺服器的預設群組名稱可被猜測，值為：public，請參考：CVE-1999-0517。 相關資訊：192.168.104.201:161。
建議解決方式: 除非有特別需要，建議可關閉此服務，否則對UDP port進入的資料進行過濾或變更預設的SNMP community string。
Name: SNMP Agent Default Community Name (public)
Synopsis: The community name of the remote SNMP server can be guessed.
Description:
It is possible to obtain the default community name of the remote
SNMP server.

An attacker may use this information to gain more knowledge about the
remote host, or to change the configuration of the remote system (if
the default community allows such modifications).
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Either filter incoming UDP packets going to this port, or change the 
default community string.
Plugin Output:
The remote SNMP server replies to the following default community
string :

public

問題描述: 主機提供rsh服務，提供使用者遠端登入操作，但該服務本身並未提供加密連線，請參考：CVE-1999-0651。 相關資訊：192.168.108.240:514。
建議解決方式: 停止不安全的rsh服務。建議遠端維護主機，用SSH等加密連線服務取代。
Name: rsh Service Detection
Synopsis: The rsh service is running on the remote host.
Description:
The rsh service is running on the remote host. This service is
vulnerable since data is passed between the rsh client and server
in cleartext. A man-in-the-middle attacker can exploit this to sniff
logins and passwords. Also, it may allow poorly authenticated logins
without passwords. If the host is vulnerable to TCP sequence number
guessing (from any network) or IP spoofing (including ARP hijacking on
a local network) then it may be possible to bypass authentication.
Finally, rsh is an easy way to turn file-write access into full
logins through the .rhosts or rhosts.equiv files.
Solution:
Comment out the 'rsh' line in /etc/inetd.conf and restart the inetd
process. Alternatively, disable this service and use SSH instead.

弱點名稱: SSL Certificate Signed Using Weak Hashing Algorithm
問題描述: SSL憑證的簽章採用較弱的雜湊演算法(sha1)，請參考：CVE-2004-2761。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:443。
建議解決方式: 如為自簽憑證請，請使用較強的簽章演算法重新簽署。或聯絡憑證機構(CA)重新發放新的憑證。
Name: SSL Certificate Signed Using Weak Hashing Algorithm
Synopsis:
An SSL certificate in the certificate chain has been signed using a
weak hash algorithm.
Description:
The remote service uses an SSL certificate chain that has been signed
using a cryptographically weak hashing algorithm (e.g. MD2, MD4, MD5,
or SHA1). These signature algorithms are known to be vulnerable to
collision attacks. An attacker can exploit this to generate another
certificate with the same digital signature, allowing an attacker to
masquerade as the affected service.

Note that this plugin reports all SSL certificate chains signed with
SHA-1 that expire after January 1, 2017 as vulnerable. This is in
accordance with Google's gradual sunsetting of the SHA-1 cryptographic
hash algorithm.

Note that certificates in the chain that are contained in the Nessus
CA database (known_CA.inc) have been ignored.
Solution: Contact the Certificate Authority to have the SSL certificate reissued.
See Also:
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3279
http://www.nessus.org/u?9bb87bf2
http://www.nessus.org/u?e120eea1
http://www.nessus.org/u?5d894816
http://www.nessus.org/u?51db68aa
http://www.nessus.org/u?9dc7bfba
Plugin Output:
The following certificates were part of the certificate chain sent by
the remote host, but contain hashes that are considered to be weak.

Subject             : C=jp/CN=RNP002673912F16
Signature Algorithm : SHA-1 With RSA Encryption
Valid From          : Feb 14 15:00:00 2016 GMT
Valid To            : Feb 14 15:00:00 2017 GMT
Raw PEM certificate : 
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----

-----END CERTIFICATE-----

問題描述: 裝置上的SNMP伺服器的預設群組名稱可被猜測，值為：public，請參考：CVE-1999-0517。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:161。
建議解決方式: 除非有特別需要，建議可關閉此服務，否則對UDP port進入的資料進行過濾或變更預設的SNMP community string。
Name: SNMP Agent Default Community Name (public)
Synopsis: The community name of the remote SNMP server can be guessed.
Description:
It is possible to obtain the default community name of the remote
SNMP server.

An attacker may use this information to gain more knowledge about the
remote host, or to change the configuration of the remote system (if
the default community allows such modifications).
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Either filter incoming UDP packets going to this port, or change the 
default community string.
Plugin Output:
The remote SNMP server replies to the following default community
string :

public

弱點名稱: SSL Medium Strength Cipher Suites Supported
問題描述: SSL支援使用中等強度的加密器(Medium Ciphers)進行加密連線，請參考：CVE-2016-2183。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:443。
建議解決方式: 建議更改受影響的應用程式設定值，讓連線僅允許支援加密強度較高的加密器(> 112-bit key)。
Name: SSL Medium Strength Cipher Suites Supported (SWEET32)
Synopsis: The remote service supports the use of medium strength SSL ciphers.
Description:
The remote host supports the use of SSL ciphers that offer medium
strength encryption. Nessus regards medium strength as any encryption
that uses key lengths at least 64 bits and less than 112 bits, or 
else that uses the 3DES encryption suite.

Note that it is considerably easier to circumvent medium strength
encryption if the attacker is on the same physical network.
Solution:
Reconfigure the affected application if possible to avoid use of
medium strength ciphers.

問題描述: 主機提供rsh服務，提供使用者遠端登入操作，但該服務本身並未提供加密連線，請參考：CVE-1999-0651。 相關資訊：192.168.110.44:514。
建議解決方式: 停止不安全的rsh服務。建議遠端維護主機，用SSH等加密連線服務取代。
Name: rsh Service Detection
Synopsis: The rsh service is running on the remote host.
Description:
The rsh service is running on the remote host. This service is
vulnerable since data is passed between the rsh client and server
in cleartext. A man-in-the-middle attacker can exploit this to sniff
logins and passwords. Also, it may allow poorly authenticated logins
without passwords. If the host is vulnerable to TCP sequence number
guessing (from any network) or IP spoofing (including ARP hijacking on
a local network) then it may be possible to bypass authentication.
Finally, rsh is an easy way to turn file-write access into full
logins through the .rhosts or rhosts.equiv files.
Solution:
Comment out the 'rsh' line in /etc/inetd.conf and restart the inetd
process. Alternatively, disable this service and use SSH instead.

問題描述: 主機提供rsh服務，提供使用者遠端登入操作，但該服務本身並未提供加密連線，請參考：CVE-1999-0651。 相關資訊：192.168.30.198:514。
建議解決方式: 停止不安全的rsh服務。建議遠端維護主機，用SSH等加密連線服務取代。
Name: rsh Service Detection
Synopsis: The rsh service is running on the remote host.
Description:
The rsh service is running on the remote host. This service is
vulnerable since data is passed between the rsh client and server
in cleartext. A man-in-the-middle attacker can exploit this to sniff
logins and passwords. Also, it may allow poorly authenticated logins
without passwords. If the host is vulnerable to TCP sequence number
guessing (from any network) or IP spoofing (including ARP hijacking on
a local network) then it may be possible to bypass authentication.
Finally, rsh is an easy way to turn file-write access into full
logins through the .rhosts or rhosts.equiv files.
Solution:
Comment out the 'rsh' line in /etc/inetd.conf and restart the inetd
process. Alternatively, disable this service and use SSH instead.

建議解決方式: 除非有特別需要，建議可關閉此服務，否則對UDP port進入的資料進行過濾或變更預設的SNMP community string。
Name: SNMP Agent Default Community Name (public)
Synopsis: The community name of the remote SNMP server can be guessed.
Description:
It is possible to obtain the default community name of the remote
SNMP server.

An attacker may use this information to gain more knowledge about the
remote host, or to change the configuration of the remote system (if
the default community allows such modifications).
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Either filter incoming UDP packets going to this port, or change the

問題描述: 主機提供rsh服務，提供使用者遠端登入操作，但該服務本身並未提供加密連線，請參考：CVE-1999-0651。 相關資訊：192.168.35.55:514。
建議解決方式: 停止不安全的rsh服務。建議遠端維護主機，用SSH等加密連線服務取代。
Name: rsh Service Detection
Synopsis: The rsh service is running on the remote host.
Description:
The rsh service is running on the remote host. This service is
vulnerable since data is passed between the rsh client and server
in cleartext. A man-in-the-middle attacker can exploit this to sniff
logins and passwords. Also, it may allow poorly authenticated logins
without passwords. If the host is vulnerable to TCP sequence number
guessing (from any network) or IP spoofing (including ARP hijacking on
a local network) then it may be possible to bypass authentication.
Finally, rsh is an easy way to turn file-write access into full
logins through the .rhosts or rhosts.equiv files.
Solution:
Comment out the 'rsh' line in /etc/inetd.conf and restart the inetd
process. Alternatively, disable this service and use SSH instead.

弱點名稱: SSL Medium Strength Cipher Suites Supported
問題描述: SSL支援使用中等強度的加密器(Medium Ciphers)進行加密連線，請參考：CVE-2016-2183。 相關資訊：192.168.40.249:443。
建議解決方式: 建議更改受影響的應用程式設定值，讓連線僅允許支援加密強度較高的加密器(> 112-bit key)。
Name: SSL Medium Strength Cipher Suites Supported (SWEET32)
Synopsis: The remote service supports the use of medium strength SSL ciphers.
Description:
The remote host supports the use of SSL ciphers that offer medium
strength encryption. Nessus regards medium strength as any encryption
that uses key lengths at least 64 bits and less than 112 bits, or 
else that uses the 3DES encryption suite.

Note that it is considerably easier to circumvent medium strength
encryption if the attacker is on the same physical network.
Solution:
Reconfigure the affected application if possible to avoid use of
medium strength ciphers.

建議解決方式: 除非有特別需要，建議可關閉此服務，否則對UDP port進入的資料進行過濾或變更預設的SNMP community string。
Name: SNMP Agent Default Community Name (public)
Synopsis: The community name of the remote SNMP server can be guessed.
Description:
It is possible to obtain the default community name of the remote
SNMP server.

An attacker may use this information to gain more knowledge about the
remote host, or to change the configuration of the remote system (if
the default community allows such modifications).
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Either filter incoming UDP packets going to this port, or change the 
default community string.
Plugin Output:
The remote SNMP server replies to the following default community
string :

public

問題描述: 主機提供rsh服務，提供使用者遠端登入操作，但該服務本身並未提供加密連線，請參考：CVE-1999-0651。 相關資訊：192.168.70.246:514。
建議解決方式: 停止不安全的rsh服務。建議遠端維護主機，用SSH等加密連線服務取代。
Name: rsh Service Detection
Synopsis: The rsh service is running on the remote host.
Description:
The rsh service is running on the remote host. This service is
vulnerable since data is passed between the rsh client and server
in cleartext. A man-in-the-middle attacker can exploit this to sniff
logins and passwords. Also, it may allow poorly authenticated logins
without passwords. If the host is vulnerable to TCP sequence number
guessing (from any network) or IP spoofing (including ARP hijacking on
a local network) then it may be possible to bypass authentication.
Finally, rsh is an easy way to turn file-write access into full
logins through the .rhosts or rhosts.equiv files.
Solution:
Comment out the 'rsh' line in /etc/inetd.conf and restart the inetd
process. Alternatively, disable this service and use SSH instead.

問題描述: 遠端主機運行mDNS (Multicast DNS)服務，有資訊洩漏的風險。 相關資訊：192.168.108.240:5353。
建議解決方式: 如果有需要可針對UDP Port 5353進入的流量進行過濾。
Name: mDNS Detection (Remote Network)
Synopsis: It is possible to obtain information about the remote host.
Description:
The remote service understands the Bonjour (also known as ZeroConf or
mDNS) protocol, which allows anyone to uncover information from the
remote host such as its operating system type and exact version, its
hostname, and the list of services it is running. 

This plugin attempts to discover mDNS used by hosts that are not on the
network segment on which Nessus resides.
Solution: Filter incoming traffic to UDP port 5353, if desired.
Plugin Output:
Nessus was able to extract the following information :

  - mDNS hostname       : RNP00267384B8F5.local.

  - Advertised services :
    o Service name      : RICOH MP C3003 [00267384B8F5]._pdl-datastream._tcp.local.
      Port number       : 9100
    o Service name      : RICOH MP C3003 [00267384B8F5]._printer._tcp.local.
      Port number       : 515
    o Service name      : RICOH MP C3003 [00267384B8F5]._ipp._tcp.local.
      Port number       : 631
    o Service name      : RICOH MP C3003 [00267384B8F5]._http._tcp.local.
      Port number       : 80

問題描述: SNMP服務會針對GETBULK請求回應大量資料。 相關資訊：192.168.108.240:161。
建議解決方式: 如不需使用建議關閉SNMP 服務，或變更public驗證字串以限制存取來源。
Name: SNMP 'GETBULK' Reflection DDoS
Synopsis:
The remote SNMP daemon is affected by a vulnerability that allows a
reflected distributed denial of service attack.
Description:
The remote SNMP daemon is responding with a large amount of data to a
'GETBULK' request with a larger than normal value for
'max-repetitions'. A remote attacker can use this SNMP server to
conduct a reflected distributed denial of service attack on an
arbitrary remote host.
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Otherwise, restrict and monitor access to this service, and consider
changing the default 'public' community string.
Plugin Output:
Nessus was able to determine the SNMP service can be abused in an SNMP
Reflection DDoS attack :

  Request size  (bytes) : 42
  Response size (bytes) : 1388

問題描述: 遠端網頁伺服器未在所有回應的標頭中，設定 X-Frame-Options 屬性，有點擊挾持(Clickjacking)的威脅，請參考：CWE:693。 相關資訊：192.168.108.240:80。
建議解決方式: 請於HTTP回傳的標頭增加X-Frame-Options項目，或於HTTP回傳的標頭增加Content-Security-Policy項目以及設定frame-ancestors值，此兩種方式皆可防止攻擊者將frame嵌入。
Name: Web Application Potentially Vulnerable to Clickjacking
Synopsis:
The remote web server may fail to mitigate a class of web application
vulnerabilities.
Description:
The remote web server does not set an X-Frame-Options response header
or a Content-Security-Policy 'frame-ancestors' response header in all
content responses. This could potentially expose the site to a
clickjacking or UI redress attack, in which an attacker can trick a
user into clicking an area of the vulnerable page that is different
than what the user perceives the page to be. This can result in a user
performing fraudulent or malicious transactions.

X-Frame-Options has been proposed by Microsoft as a way to mitigate
clickjacking attacks and is currently supported by all major browser
vendors.

Content-Security-Policy (CSP) has been proposed by the W3C Web
Application Security Working Group, with increasing support among
all major browser vendors, as a way to mitigate clickjacking and other
attacks. The 'frame-ancestors' policy directive restricts which
sources can embed the protected resource.

Note that while the X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy
response headers are not the only mitigations for clickjacking, they
are currently the most reliable methods that can be detected through
automation. Therefore, this plugin may produce false positives if
other mitigation strategies (e.g., frame-busting JavaScript) are
deployed or if the page does not perform any security-sensitive
transactions.
Solution:
Return the X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy (with the
'frame-ancestors' directive) HTTP header with the page's response.
This prevents the page's content from being rendered by another site

問題描述: 遠端主機運行mDNS (Multicast DNS)服務，有資訊洩漏的風險。 相關資訊：192.168.109.201:5353。
建議解決方式: 如果有需要可針對UDP Port 5353進入的流量進行過濾。
Name: mDNS Detection (Remote Network)
Synopsis: It is possible to obtain information about the remote host.
Description:
The remote service understands the Bonjour (also known as ZeroConf or
mDNS) protocol, which allows anyone to uncover information from the
remote host such as its operating system type and exact version, its
hostname, and the list of services it is running. 

This plugin attempts to discover mDNS used by hosts that are not on the
network segment on which Nessus resides.
Solution: Filter incoming traffic to UDP port 5353, if desired.

問題描述: Telnet伺服器以明文方式傳輸資料。 相關資訊：192.168.109.201:23。
建議解決方式: 建議遠端連線改為可提供加密連線的SSH。
Name: Unencrypted Telnet Server
Synopsis: The remote Telnet server transmits traffic in cleartext.
Description:
The remote host is running a Telnet server over an unencrypted
channel.

Using Telnet over an unencrypted channel is not recommended as logins,
passwords, and commands are transferred in cleartext. This allows a 
remote, man-in-the-middle attacker to eavesdrop on a Telnet session to
obtain credentials or other sensitive information and to modify
traffic exchanged between a client and server.

SSH is preferred over Telnet since it protects credentials from
eavesdropping and can tunnel additional data streams such as an X11
session.
Solution: Disable the Telnet service and use SSH instead.
Plugin Output:
Nessus collected the following banner from the remote Telnet server :

------------------------------ snip ------------------------------

RICOH Maintenance Shell.   
User access verification.
login:
------------------------------ snip ------------------------------

問題描述: SNMP服務會針對GETBULK請求回應大量資料。 相關資訊：192.168.109.202:161。
建議解決方式: 如不需使用建議關閉SNMP 服務，或變更public驗證字串以限制存取來源。
Name: SNMP 'GETBULK' Reflection DDoS
Synopsis:
The remote SNMP daemon is affected by a vulnerability that allows a
reflected distributed denial of service attack.
Description:
The remote SNMP daemon is responding with a large amount of data to a
'GETBULK' request with a larger than normal value for
'max-repetitions'. A remote attacker can use this SNMP server to
conduct a reflected distributed denial of service attack on an
arbitrary remote host.
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Otherwise, restrict and monitor access to this service, and consider
changing the default 'public' community string.
Plugin Output:
Nessus was able to determine the SNMP service can be abused in an SNMP
Reflection DDoS attack :

  Request size  (bytes) : 42
  Response size (bytes) : 1393

問題描述: 遠端網頁伺服器未在所有回應的標頭中，設定 X-Frame-Options 屬性，有點擊挾持(Clickjacking)的威脅，請參考：CWE:693。 相關資訊：192.168.109.202:80。
建議解決方式: 請於HTTP回傳的標頭增加X-Frame-Options項目，或於HTTP回傳的標頭增加Content-Security-Policy項目以及設定frame-ancestors值，此兩種方式皆可防止攻擊者將frame嵌入。
Name: Web Application Potentially Vulnerable to Clickjacking
Synopsis:
The remote web server may fail to mitigate a class of web application
vulnerabilities.
Description:
The remote web server does not set an X-Frame-Options response header
or a Content-Security-Policy 'frame-ancestors' response header in all
content responses. This could potentially expose the site to a
clickjacking or UI redress attack, in which an attacker can trick a
user into clicking an area of the vulnerable page that is different
than what the user perceives the page to be. This can result in a user
performing fraudulent or malicious transactions.

X-Frame-Options has been proposed by Microsoft as a way to mitigate
clickjacking attacks and is currently supported by all major browser
vendors.

Content-Security-Policy (CSP) has been proposed by the W3C Web
Application Security Working Group, with increasing support among
all major browser vendors, as a way to mitigate clickjacking and other
attacks. The 'frame-ancestors' policy directive restricts which
sources can embed the protected resource.

Note that while the X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy
response headers are not the only mitigations for clickjacking, they
are currently the most reliable methods that can be detected through
automation. Therefore, this plugin may produce false positives if
other mitigation strategies (e.g., frame-busting JavaScript) are
deployed or if the page does not perform any security-sensitive
transactions.
Solution:
Return the X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy (with the
'frame-ancestors' directive) HTTP header with the page's response.
This prevents the page's content from being rendered by another site
when using the frame or iframe HTML tags.
Plugin Output:
The following pages do not use a clickjacking mitigation response header and contain a clickable event :

  - http://192.168.109.202/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/aboutWim.cgi
  - http://192.168.109.202/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/authForm.cgi
  - http://192.168.109.202/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/header.cgi
  - http://192.168.109.202/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/topPage.cgi
  - http://192.168.109.202/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/waSearchFirst.cgi
  - http://192.168.109.202/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/waSearchResult.cgi

問題描述: 加密連線使用的數位憑證(Certificate)並不受到信任。這可能是因為伺服器提供無效的憑證或是簽署環節出現問題。 相關資訊：192.168.11.50:443。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證。
Name: SSL Certificate Cannot Be Trusted
Synopsis: The SSL certificate for this service cannot be trusted.
Description:
The server's X.509 certificate cannot be trusted. This situation can
occur in three different ways, in which the chain of trust can be
broken, as stated below :

  - First, the top of the certificate chain sent by the
    server might not be descended from a known public
    certificate authority. This can occur either when the
    top of the chain is an unrecognized, self-signed
    certificate, or when intermediate certificates are
    missing that would connect the top of the certificate
    chain to a known public certificate authority.

  - Second, the certificate chain may contain a certificate
    that is not valid at the time of the scan. This can
    occur either when the scan occurs before one of the
    certificate's 'notBefore' dates, or after one of the
    certificate's 'notAfter' dates.

  - Third, the certificate chain may contain a signature
    that either didn't match the certificate's information
    or could not be verified. Bad signatures can be fixed by
    getting the certificate with the bad signature to be
    re-signed by its issuer. Signatures that could not be
    verified are the result of the certificate's issuer
    using a signing algorithm that Nessus either does not
    support or does not recognize.

If the remote host is a public host in production, any break in the
chain makes it more difficult for users to verify the authenticity and 
identity of the web server. This could make it easier to carry out 
man-in-the-middle attacks against the remote host.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but it is signed by an unknown
certificate authority :

|-Subject : CN=FX-2FA7BF
|-Issuer  : CN=FX-2FA7BF

問題描述: 主機的數位憑證為自行簽署(Self_Signed)，而並非由公認之電子商務認證授權機構所發布。 相關資訊：192.168.11.50:443。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證，正式環境應使用公認之數位認證授權機構所發布的電子憑證。如內網需使用自簽憑證，建議自行架設Root CA來簽發憑證，並將Root CA的憑證匯入使用。(註：內網環境可依實際網路管控政策調整風險程度)
Name: SSL Self-Signed Certificate
Synopsis:
The SSL certificate chain for this service ends in an unrecognized
self-signed certificate.
Description:
The X.509 certificate chain for this service is not signed by a
recognized certificate authority.  If the remote host is a public host
in production, this nullifies the use of SSL as anyone could establish
a man-in-the-middle attack against the remote host. 

Note that this plugin does not check for certificate chains that end
in a certificate that is not self-signed, but is signed by an
unrecognized certificate authority.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was found at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but is self-signed and was not
found in the list of known certificate authorities :

|-Subject : CN=FX-2FA7BF

問題描述: 遠端主機被偵測到支援TLSv 1.0的加密通訊協定。 相關資訊：192.168.11.50:443。
建議解決方式: 建議變更相關網路服務設定值，關閉TLS 1.0的支援，並開啟TLS 1.2、TLS 1.3之安全版本的協定。
Name: TLS Version 1.0 Protocol Detection
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.0. TLS 1.0 has a
number of cryptographic design flaws. Modern implementations of TLS 1.0
mitigate these problems, but newer versions of TLS like 1.2 and 1.3 are
designed against these flaws and should be used whenever possible.

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that arent enabled for TLS 1.2
and higher will no longer function properly with major web browsers and major vendors.

PCI DSS v3.2 requires that TLS 1.0 be disabled entirely by June 30,
2018, except for POS POI terminals (and the SSL/TLS termination
points to which they connect) that can be verified as not being
susceptible to any known exploits.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.0.
Plugin Output: TLSv1 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.

問題描述: 遠端主機被偵測到支援TLSv 1.0的加密通訊協定。 相關資訊：192.168.11.50:631。

問題描述: 遠端服務使用較舊的 TLS 版本(TLS 1.1)加密傳輸的資料。 相關資訊：192.168.11.50:443。
建議解決方式: 啟用 TLS 1.2 與/或 1.3 支援，並停用 TLS 1.1 支援。
Name: TLS Version 1.1 Deprecated Protocol
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.1. TLS 1.1 lacks support for current and recommended
cipher suites. Ciphers that support encryption before MAC computation, and authenticated encryption modes such as GCM
cannot be used with TLS 1.1

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that are not enabled for TLS 1.2 and higher will no longer function properly with major
web browsers and major vendors.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and/or 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.1.

Name: TLS Version 1.1 Deprecated Protocol
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.1. TLS 1.1 lacks support for current and recommended
cipher suites. Ciphers that support encryption before MAC computation, and authenticated encryption modes such as GCM
cannot be used with TLS 1.1

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that are not enabled for TLS 1.2 and higher will no longer function properly with major
web browsers and major vendors.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and/or 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.1.

問題描述: SNMP服務會針對GETBULK請求回應大量資料。 相關資訊：192.168.110.240:161。
建議解決方式: 如不需使用建議關閉SNMP 服務，或變更public驗證字串以限制存取來源。
Name: SNMP 'GETBULK' Reflection DDoS
Synopsis:
The remote SNMP daemon is affected by a vulnerability that allows a
reflected distributed denial of service attack.
Description:
The remote SNMP daemon is responding with a large amount of data to a
'GETBULK' request with a larger than normal value for
'max-repetitions'. A remote attacker can use this SNMP server to
conduct a reflected distributed denial of service attack on an
arbitrary remote host.
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Otherwise, restrict and monitor access to this service, and consider
changing the default 'public' community string.
Plugin Output:
Nessus was able to determine the SNMP service can be abused in an SNMP
Reflection DDoS attack :

  Response size (bytes) : 1380

問題描述: Telnet伺服器以明文方式傳輸資料。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:23。
建議解決方式: 建議遠端連線改為可提供加密連線的SSH。
Name: Unencrypted Telnet Server
Synopsis: The remote Telnet server transmits traffic in cleartext.
Description:
The remote host is running a Telnet server over an unencrypted
channel.

Using Telnet over an unencrypted channel is not recommended as logins,
passwords, and commands are transferred in cleartext. This allows a 
remote, man-in-the-middle attacker to eavesdrop on a Telnet session to
obtain credentials or other sensitive information and to modify
traffic exchanged between a client and server.

SSH is preferred over Telnet since it protects credentials from
eavesdropping and can tunnel additional data streams such as an X11
session.
Solution: Disable the Telnet service and use SSH instead.

問題描述: 加密連線使用的數位憑證(Certificate)並不受到信任。這可能是因為伺服器提供無效的憑證或是簽署環節出現問題。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:443。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證。
Name: SSL Certificate Cannot Be Trusted
Synopsis: The SSL certificate for this service cannot be trusted.
Description:
The server's X.509 certificate cannot be trusted. This situation can
occur in three different ways, in which the chain of trust can be
broken, as stated below :

  - First, the top of the certificate chain sent by the
    server might not be descended from a known public
    certificate authority. This can occur either when the
    top of the chain is an unrecognized, self-signed
    certificate, or when intermediate certificates are
    missing that would connect the top of the certificate
    chain to a known public certificate authority.

  - Second, the certificate chain may contain a certificate
    that is not valid at the time of the scan. This can
    occur either when the scan occurs before one of the
    certificate's 'notBefore' dates, or after one of the
    certificate's 'notAfter' dates.

  - Third, the certificate chain may contain a signature
    that either didn't match the certificate's information
    or could not be verified. Bad signatures can be fixed by
    getting the certificate with the bad signature to be
    re-signed by its issuer. Signatures that could not be
    verified are the result of the certificate's issuer
    using a signing algorithm that Nessus either does not
    support or does not recognize.

If the remote host is a public host in production, any break in the
chain makes it more difficult for users to verify the authenticity and 
identity of the web server. This could make it easier to carry out 
man-in-the-middle attacks against the remote host.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was part of the certificate chain
sent by the remote host, but it has expired :

|-Subject   : C=jp/CN=RNP002673912F16
|-Not After : Feb 14 15:00:00 2017 GMT

The following certificate was at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but it is signed by an unknown
certificate authority :

|-Subject : C=jp/CN=RNP002673912F16
|-Issuer  : C=jp/CN=RNP002673912F16

問題描述: 主機的數位憑證為自行簽署(Self_Signed)，而並非由公認之電子商務認證授權機構所發布。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:443。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證，正式環境應使用公認之數位認證授權機構所發布的電子憑證。如內網需使用自簽憑證，建議自行架設Root CA來簽發憑證，並將Root CA的憑證匯入使用。(註：內網環境可依實際網路管控政策調整風險程度)
Name: SSL Self-Signed Certificate
Synopsis:
The SSL certificate chain for this service ends in an unrecognized
self-signed certificate.
Description:
The X.509 certificate chain for this service is not signed by a
recognized certificate authority.  If the remote host is a public host
in production, this nullifies the use of SSL as anyone could establish
a man-in-the-middle attack against the remote host. 

Note that this plugin does not check for certificate chains that end
in a certificate that is not self-signed, but is signed by an
unrecognized certificate authority.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was found at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but is self-signed and was not
found in the list of known certificate authorities :

|-Subject : C=jp/CN=RNP002673912F16

問題描述: 遠端網頁伺服器未在所有回應的標頭中，設定 X-Frame-Options 屬性，有點擊挾持(Clickjacking)的威脅，請參考：CWE:693。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:80。
建議解決方式: 請於HTTP回傳的標頭增加X-Frame-Options項目，或於HTTP回傳的標頭增加Content-Security-Policy項目以及設定frame-ancestors值，此兩種方式皆可防止攻擊者將frame嵌入。
Name: Web Application Potentially Vulnerable to Clickjacking
Synopsis:
The remote web server may fail to mitigate a class of web application
vulnerabilities.
Description:
The remote web server does not set an X-Frame-Options response header
or a Content-Security-Policy 'frame-ancestors' response header in all
content responses. This could potentially expose the site to a
clickjacking or UI redress attack, in which an attacker can trick a
user into clicking an area of the vulnerable page that is different
than what the user perceives the page to be. This can result in a user
performing fraudulent or malicious transactions.

X-Frame-Options has been proposed by Microsoft as a way to mitigate
clickjacking attacks and is currently supported by all major browser
vendors.

Content-Security-Policy (CSP) has been proposed by the W3C Web
Application Security Working Group, with increasing support among
all major browser vendors, as a way to mitigate clickjacking and other
attacks. The 'frame-ancestors' policy directive restricts which
sources can embed the protected resource.

Note that while the X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy
response headers are not the only mitigations for clickjacking, they
are currently the most reliable methods that can be detected through
automation. Therefore, this plugin may produce false positives if
other mitigation strategies (e.g., frame-busting JavaScript) are
deployed or if the page does not perform any security-sensitive
transactions.
Solution:
Return the X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy (with the
'frame-ancestors' directive) HTTP header with the page's response.
This prevents the page's content from being rendered by another site
when using the frame or iframe HTML tags.
Plugin Output:
The following pages do not use a clickjacking mitigation response header and contain a clickable event :

  - http://192.168.110.241/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/aboutWim.cgi
  - http://192.168.110.241/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/authForm.cgi
  - http://192.168.110.241/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/header.cgi
  - http://192.168.110.241/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/topPage.cgi
  - http://192.168.110.241/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/waSearchFirst.cgi
  - http://192.168.110.241/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/waSearchResult.cgi

問題描述: 遠端主機被偵測到支援TLSv 1.0的加密通訊協定。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:443。
建議解決方式: 建議變更相關網路服務設定值，關閉TLS 1.0的支援，並開啟TLS 1.2、TLS 1.3之安全版本的協定。
Name: TLS Version 1.0 Protocol Detection
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.0. TLS 1.0 has a
number of cryptographic design flaws. Modern implementations of TLS 1.0
mitigate these problems, but newer versions of TLS like 1.2 and 1.3 are
designed against these flaws and should be used whenever possible.

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that arent enabled for TLS 1.2
and higher will no longer function properly with major web browsers and major vendors.

PCI DSS v3.2 requires that TLS 1.0 be disabled entirely by June 30,
2018, except for POS POI terminals (and the SSL/TLS termination
points to which they connect) that can be verified as not being
susceptible to any known exploits.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.0.
Plugin Output: TLSv1 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.

問題描述: 遠端服務使用較舊的 TLS 版本(TLS 1.1)加密傳輸的資料。 相關資訊：192.168.110.241:443。
建議解決方式: 啟用 TLS 1.2 與/或 1.3 支援，並停用 TLS 1.1 支援。
Name: TLS Version 1.1 Deprecated Protocol
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.1. TLS 1.1 lacks support for current and recommended
cipher suites. Ciphers that support encryption before MAC computation, and authenticated encryption modes such as GCM
cannot be used with TLS 1.1

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that are not enabled for TLS 1.2 and higher will no longer function properly with major
web browsers and major vendors.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and/or 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.1.
Plugin Output: TLSv1.1 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.

問題描述: 加密連線使用的數位憑證(Certificate)並不受到信任。這可能是因為伺服器提供無效的憑證或是簽署環節出現問題。 相關資訊：192.168.12.201:443。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證。
Name: SSL Certificate Cannot Be Trusted
Synopsis: The SSL certificate for this service cannot be trusted.
Description:
The server's X.509 certificate cannot be trusted. This situation can
occur in three different ways, in which the chain of trust can be
broken, as stated below :

  - First, the top of the certificate chain sent by the
    server might not be descended from a known public
    certificate authority. This can occur either when the
    top of the chain is an unrecognized, self-signed
    certificate, or when intermediate certificates are
    missing that would connect the top of the certificate
    chain to a known public certificate authority.

  - Second, the certificate chain may contain a certificate
    that is not valid at the time of the scan. This can
    occur either when the scan occurs before one of the
    certificate's 'notBefore' dates, or after one of the
    certificate's 'notAfter' dates.

  - Third, the certificate chain may contain a signature
    that either didn't match the certificate's information
    or could not be verified. Bad signatures can be fixed by
    getting the certificate with the bad signature to be
    re-signed by its issuer. Signatures that could not be
    verified are the result of the certificate's issuer
    using a signing algorithm that Nessus either does not
    support or does not recognize.

If the remote host is a public host in production, any break in the
chain makes it more difficult for users to verify the authenticity and 
identity of the web server. This could make it easier to carry out 
man-in-the-middle attacks against the remote host.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.

The following certificate was at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but it is signed by an unknown
certificate authority :

|-Subject : CN=FX-2FA11D
|-Issuer  : CN=FX-2FA11D

建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證，正式環境應使用公認之數位認證授權機構所發布的電子憑證。如內網需使用自簽憑證，建議自行架設Root CA來簽發憑證，並將Root CA的憑證匯入使用。(註：內網環境可依實際網路管控政策調整風險程度)
Name: SSL Self-Signed Certificate
Synopsis:
The SSL certificate chain for this service ends in an unrecognized
self-signed certificate.
Description:
The X.509 certificate chain for this service is not signed by a
recognized certificate authority.  If the remote host is a public host
in production, this nullifies the use of SSL as anyone could establish
a man-in-the-middle attack against the remote host. 

Note that this plugin does not check for certificate chains that end
in a certificate that is not self-signed, but is signed by an
unrecognized certificate authority.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was found at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but is self-signed and was not
found in the list of known certificate authorities :

|-Subject : CN=FX-2FA11D

問題描述: SNMP服務會針對GETBULK請求回應大量資料。 相關資訊：192.168.12.201:161。
建議解決方式: 如不需使用建議關閉SNMP 服務，或變更public驗證字串以限制存取來源。
Name: SNMP 'GETBULK' Reflection DDoS
Synopsis:
The remote SNMP daemon is affected by a vulnerability that allows a
reflected distributed denial of service attack.
Description:
The remote SNMP daemon is responding with a large amount of data to a
'GETBULK' request with a larger than normal value for
'max-repetitions'. A remote attacker can use this SNMP server to
conduct a reflected distributed denial of service attack on an
arbitrary remote host.
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Otherwise, restrict and monitor access to this service, and consider
changing the default 'public' community string.
Plugin Output:
Nessus was able to determine the SNMP service can be abused in an SNMP
Reflection DDoS attack :

  Request size  (bytes) : 42
  Response size (bytes) : 1968

問題描述: 遠端主機被偵測到支援TLSv 1.0的加密通訊協定。 相關資訊：192.168.12.201:443。
建議解決方式: 建議變更相關網路服務設定值，關閉TLS 1.0的支援，並開啟TLS 1.2、TLS 1.3之安全版本的協定。
Name: TLS Version 1.0 Protocol Detection
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.0. TLS 1.0 has a
number of cryptographic design flaws. Modern implementations of TLS 1.0
mitigate these problems, but newer versions of TLS like 1.2 and 1.3 are
designed against these flaws and should be used whenever possible.

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that arent enabled for TLS 1.2
and higher will no longer function properly with major web browsers and major vendors.

PCI DSS v3.2 requires that TLS 1.0 be disabled entirely by June 30,
2018, except for POS POI terminals (and the SSL/TLS termination
points to which they connect) that can be verified as not being
susceptible to any known exploits.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.0.
Plugin Output: TLSv1 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.

問題描述: 遠端服務使用較舊的 TLS 版本(TLS 1.1)加密傳輸的資料。 相關資訊：192.168.12.201:443。
建議解決方式: 啟用 TLS 1.2 與/或 1.3 支援，並停用 TLS 1.1 支援。
Name: TLS Version 1.1 Deprecated Protocol
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.1. TLS 1.1 lacks support for current and recommended
cipher suites. Ciphers that support encryption before MAC computation, and authenticated encryption modes such as GCM
cannot be used with TLS 1.1

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that are not enabled for TLS 1.2 and higher will no longer function properly with major
web browsers and major vendors.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and/or 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.1.
Plugin Output: TLSv1.1 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.

問題描述: 加密連線使用的數位憑證(Certificate)並不受到信任。這可能是因為伺服器提供無效的憑證或是簽署環節出現問題。 相關資訊：192.168.14.99:443。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證。
Name: SSL Certificate Cannot Be Trusted
Synopsis: The SSL certificate for this service cannot be trusted.
Description:
The server's X.509 certificate cannot be trusted. This situation can
occur in three different ways, in which the chain of trust can be
broken, as stated below :

  - First, the top of the certificate chain sent by the
    server might not be descended from a known public
    certificate authority. This can occur either when the
    top of the chain is an unrecognized, self-signed
    certificate, or when intermediate certificates are
    missing that would connect the top of the certificate
    chain to a known public certificate authority.

  - Second, the certificate chain may contain a certificate
    that is not valid at the time of the scan. This can
    occur either when the scan occurs before one of the
    certificate's 'notBefore' dates, or after one of the
    certificate's 'notAfter' dates.

  - Third, the certificate chain may contain a signature
    that either didn't match the certificate's information
    or could not be verified. Bad signatures can be fixed by
    getting the certificate with the bad signature to be
    re-signed by its issuer. Signatures that could not be
    verified are the result of the certificate's issuer
    using a signing algorithm that Nessus either does not
    support or does not recognize.

If the remote host is a public host in production, any break in the
chain makes it more difficult for users to verify the authenticity and 
identity of the web server. This could make it easier to carry out 
man-in-the-middle attacks against the remote host.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but it is signed by an unknown
certificate authority :

|-Subject : CN=FX-2F9F87
|-Issuer  : CN=FX-2F9F87

問題描述: 網頁伺服器上的共通閘道介面腳本(CGI script)並沒有對惡意JavaScript做適當處理，故有遭受HTML注入(HTML Injection)的風險。 相關資訊：192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?action=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>、192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?adminloginbtn=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>、192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?ggt_hidden(10008)=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>、192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?ggt_textbox(10007)=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>、192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?loginbtn=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>、192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?ordinate=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>、192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?searchchar=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>、192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?sellang=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>、192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?sysadminloginbtn=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>、192.168.15.212:443/login.html?/site_search.html?token2=%00<<<<"nbqcye%20>>>。
建議解決方式: 檢查並修改受影響的網路應用程式。限制有漏洞的共通閘道介面腳本(CGI script)的權限，或聯絡軟體開發廠商進行更新。
Name: CGI Generic HTML Injections (quick test)
Synopsis: The remote web server may be prone to HTML injections.
Description:
The remote web server hosts CGI scripts that fail to adequately sanitize 
request strings with malicious JavaScript.  By leveraging this issue, 
an attacker may be able to cause arbitrary HTML to be executed in a 
user's browser within the security context of the affected site.

The remote web server may be vulnerable to IFRAME injections or 
cross-site scripting attacks :

  - IFRAME injections allow 'virtual defacement' that 
    might scare or anger gullible users. Such injections 
    are sometimes implemented for 'phishing' attacks. 

  - XSS are extensively tested by four other scripts.

  - Some applications (e.g. web forums) authorize a subset
    of HTML without any ill effect. In this case, ignore 
    this warning.
Solution:
Either restrict access to the vulnerable application or contact the
vendor for an update.

建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證，正式環境應使用公認之數位認證授權機構所發布的電子憑證。如內網需使用自簽憑證，建議自行架設Root CA來簽發憑證，並將Root CA的憑證匯入使用。(註：內網環境可依實際網路管控政策調整風險程度)
Name: SSL Self-Signed Certificate
Synopsis:
The SSL certificate chain for this service ends in an unrecognized
self-signed certificate.
Description:
The X.509 certificate chain for this service is not signed by a
recognized certificate authority.  If the remote host is a public host
in production, this nullifies the use of SSL as anyone could establish
a man-in-the-middle attack against the remote host. 

Note that this plugin does not check for certificate chains that end
in a certificate that is not self-signed, but is signed by an
unrecognized certificate authority.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was found at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but is self-signed and was not
found in the list of known certificate authorities :

|-Subject : CN=SC741265/C=JP

問題描述: SNMP服務會針對GETBULK請求回應大量資料。 相關資訊：192.168.15.212:161。
建議解決方式: 如不需使用建議關閉SNMP 服務，或變更public驗證字串以限制存取來源。
Name: SNMP 'GETBULK' Reflection DDoS
Synopsis:
The remote SNMP daemon is affected by a vulnerability that allows a
reflected distributed denial of service attack.
Description:
The remote SNMP daemon is responding with a large amount of data to a
'GETBULK' request with a larger than normal value for
'max-repetitions'. A remote attacker can use this SNMP server to
conduct a reflected distributed denial of service attack on an
arbitrary remote host.
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Otherwise, restrict and monitor access to this service, and consider
changing the default 'public' community string.
Plugin Output:
Nessus was able to determine the SNMP service can be abused in an SNMP
Reflection DDoS attack :

  Request size  (bytes) : 42
  Response size (bytes) : 2033

問題描述: 遠端主機被偵測到支援TLSv 1.0的加密通訊協定。 相關資訊：192.168.15.212:443。
建議解決方式: 建議變更相關網路服務設定值，關閉TLS 1.0的支援，並開啟TLS 1.2、TLS 1.3之安全版本的協定。
Name: TLS Version 1.0 Protocol Detection
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.0. TLS 1.0 has a
number of cryptographic design flaws. Modern implementations of TLS 1.0
mitigate these problems, but newer versions of TLS like 1.2 and 1.3 are
designed against these flaws and should be used whenever possible.

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that arent enabled for TLS 1.2
and higher will no longer function properly with major web browsers and major vendors.

PCI DSS v3.2 requires that TLS 1.0 be disabled entirely by June 30,
2018, except for POS POI terminals (and the SSL/TLS termination
points to which they connect) that can be verified as not being
susceptible to any known exploits.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.0.
Plugin Output: TLSv1 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.

問題描述: 遠端服務使用較舊的 TLS 版本(TLS 1.1)加密傳輸的資料。 相關資訊：192.168.15.212:443。
建議解決方式: 啟用 TLS 1.2 與/或 1.3 支援，並停用 TLS 1.1 支援。
Name: TLS Version 1.1 Deprecated Protocol
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.1. TLS 1.1 lacks support for current and recommended
cipher suites. Ciphers that support encryption before MAC computation, and authenticated encryption modes such as GCM
cannot be used with TLS 1.1

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that are not enabled for TLS 1.2 and higher will no longer function properly with major
web browsers and major vendors.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and/or 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.1.
Plugin Output: TLSv1.1 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.

弱點名稱: Weak Ciphers (Weak Ciphers) For SSL/TLS Encrypted
問題描述: 主機上的服務支援使用弱的加密器(Weak Ciphers)進行SSL/TLS加密連線。 相關資訊：192.168.16.168:443。
建議解決方式: 建議更改受影響的應用程式設定值，讓連線僅允許支援強的加密器(> 112-bit key)。
Name: SSL Weak Cipher Suites Supported
Synopsis: The remote service supports the use of weak SSL ciphers.
Description:
The remote host supports the use of SSL ciphers that offer weak
encryption.

Note: This is considerably easier to exploit if the attacker is on the
same physical network.
Solution:
Reconfigure the affected application, if possible to avoid the use of
weak ciphers.

問題描述: 加密連線使用的數位憑證(Certificate)並不受到信任。這可能是因為伺服器提供無效的憑證或是簽署環節出現問題。 相關資訊：192.168.16.168:443。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證。
Name: SSL Certificate Cannot Be Trusted
Synopsis: The SSL certificate for this service cannot be trusted.
Description:
The server's X.509 certificate cannot be trusted. This situation can
occur in three different ways, in which the chain of trust can be
broken, as stated below :

  - First, the top of the certificate chain sent by the
    server might not be descended from a known public
    certificate authority. This can occur either when the
    top of the chain is an unrecognized, self-signed
    certificate, or when intermediate certificates are
    missing that would connect the top of the certificate
    chain to a known public certificate authority.

  - Second, the certificate chain may contain a certificate
    that is not valid at the time of the scan. This can
    occur either when the scan occurs before one of the
    certificate's 'notBefore' dates, or after one of the
    certificate's 'notAfter' dates.

  - Third, the certificate chain may contain a signature
    that either didn't match the certificate's information
    or could not be verified. Bad signatures can be fixed by
    getting the certificate with the bad signature to be
    re-signed by its issuer. Signatures that could not be
    verified are the result of the certificate's issuer
    using a signing algorithm that Nessus either does not
    support or does not recognize.

If the remote host is a public host in production, any break in the
chain makes it more difficult for users to verify the authenticity and 
identity of the web server. This could make it easier to carry out 
man-in-the-middle attacks against the remote host.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but it is signed by an unknown
certificate authority :

|-Subject : CN=SHARP MX-3050N/C=JP
|-Issuer  : CN=SHARP MX-3050N/C=JP

問題描述: 遠端網頁伺服器未在所有回應的標頭中，設定 X-Frame-Options 屬性，有點擊挾持(Clickjacking)的威脅，請參考：CWE:693。 相關資訊：192.168.18.191:80。
建議解決方式: 請於HTTP回傳的標頭增加X-Frame-Options項目，或於HTTP回傳的標頭增加Content-Security-Policy項目以及設定frame-ancestors值，此兩種方式皆可防止攻擊者將frame嵌入。
Name: Web Application Potentially Vulnerable to Clickjacking
Synopsis:
The remote web server may fail to mitigate a class of web application
vulnerabilities.
Description:
The remote web server does not set an X-Frame-Options response header
or a Content-Security-Policy 'frame-ancestors' response header in all
content responses. This could potentially expose the site to a
clickjacking or UI redress attack, in which an attacker can trick a
user into clicking an area of the vulnerable page that is different
than what the user perceives the page to be. This can result in a user
performing fraudulent or malicious transactions.

X-Frame-Options has been proposed by Microsoft as a way to mitigate
clickjacking attacks and is currently supported by all major browser
vendors.

Content-Security-Policy (CSP) has been proposed by the W3C Web
Application Security Working Group, with increasing support among
all major browser vendors, as a way to mitigate clickjacking and other
attacks. The 'frame-ancestors' policy directive restricts which
sources can embed the protected resource.

Note that while the X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy
response headers are not the only mitigations for clickjacking, they
are currently the most reliable methods that can be detected through
automation. Therefore, this plugin may produce false positives if
other mitigation strategies (e.g., frame-busting JavaScript) are
deployed or if the page does not perform any security-sensitive
transactions.
Solution:
Return the X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy (with the
'frame-ancestors' directive) HTTP header with the page's response.
This prevents the page's content from being rendered by another site
when using the frame or iframe HTML tags.
Plugin Output:
The following pages do not use a clickjacking mitigation response header and contain a clickable event :

  - http://192.168.18.191/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/aboutWim.cgi
  - http://192.168.18.191/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/authForm.cgi
  - http://192.168.18.191/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/header.cgi
  - http://192.168.18.191/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/topPage.cgi
  - http://192.168.18.191/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/waSearchFirst.cgi
  - http://192.168.18.191/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/waSearchResult.cgi

問題描述: 遠端主機運行mDNS (Multicast DNS)服務，有資訊洩漏的風險。 相關資訊：192.168.30.198:5353。
建議解決方式: 如果有需要可針對UDP Port 5353進入的流量進行過濾。
Name: mDNS Detection (Remote Network)
Synopsis: It is possible to obtain information about the remote host.
Description:
The remote service understands the Bonjour (also known as ZeroConf or
mDNS) protocol, which allows anyone to uncover information from the
remote host such as its operating system type and exact version, its
hostname, and the list of services it is running. 

This plugin attempts to discover mDNS used by hosts that are not on the
network segment on which Nessus resides.
Solution: Filter incoming traffic to UDP port 5353, if desired.
Plugin Output:
Nessus was able to extract the following information :

  - mDNS hostname       : RNP002673BBD89F.local.

  - Advertised services :
    o Service name      : RICOH MP 2554 [002673BBD89F]._pdl-datastream._tcp.local.
      Port number       : 9100
    o Service name      : RICOH MP 2554 [002673BBD89F]._printer._tcp.local.
      Port number       : 515
    o Service name      : RICOH MP 2554 [002673BBD89F]._ipp._tcp.local.
      Port number       : 631
    o Service name      : RICOH MP 2554 [002673BBD89F]._http._tcp.local.
      Port number       : 80

問題描述: Telnet伺服器以明文方式傳輸資料。 相關資訊：192.168.30.198:23。
建議解決方式: 建議遠端連線改為可提供加密連線的SSH。
Name: Unencrypted Telnet Server
Synopsis: The remote Telnet server transmits traffic in cleartext.
Description:
The remote host is running a Telnet server over an unencrypted
channel.

Using Telnet over an unencrypted channel is not recommended as logins,
passwords, and commands are transferred in cleartext. This allows a 
remote, man-in-the-middle attacker to eavesdrop on a Telnet session to
obtain credentials or other sensitive information and to modify
traffic exchanged between a client and server.

SSH is preferred over Telnet since it protects credentials from
eavesdropping and can tunnel additional data streams such as an X11
session.
Solution: Disable the Telnet service and use SSH instead.
Plugin Output:
Nessus collected the following banner from the remote Telnet server :

------------------------------ snip ------------------------------

RICOH Maintenance Shell.   
User access verification.
login:
------------------------------ snip ------------------------------

traffic exchanged between a client and server.

eavesdropping and can tunnel additional data streams such as an X11

Name: SNMP 'GETBULK' Reflection DDoS
Synopsis:
The remote SNMP daemon is affected by a vulnerability that allows a
reflected distributed denial of service attack.
Description:
The remote SNMP daemon is responding with a large amount of data to a
'GETBULK' request with a larger than normal value for
'max-repetitions'. A remote attacker can use this SNMP server to
conduct a reflected distributed denial of service attack on an
arbitrary remote host.
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Otherwise, restrict and monitor access to this service, and consider
changing the default 'public' community string.

問題描述: 遠端網頁伺服器未在所有回應的標頭中，設定 X-Frame-Options 屬性，有點擊挾持(Clickjacking)的威脅，請參考：CWE:693。 相關資訊：192.168.31.240:80。
建議解決方式: 請於HTTP回傳的標頭增加X-Frame-Options項目，或於HTTP回傳的標頭增加Content-Security-Policy項目以及設定frame-ancestors值，此兩種方式皆可防止攻擊者將frame嵌入。
Name: Web Application Potentially Vulnerable to Clickjacking
Synopsis:
The remote web server may fail to mitigate a class of web application
vulnerabilities.
Description:
The remote web server does not set an X-Frame-Options response header
or a Content-Security-Policy 'frame-ancestors' response header in all
content responses. This could potentially expose the site to a
clickjacking or UI redress attack, in which an attacker can trick a
user into clicking an area of the vulnerable page that is different
than what the user perceives the page to be. This can result in a user
performing fraudulent or malicious transactions.

X-Frame-Options has been proposed by Microsoft as a way to mitigate
clickjacking attacks and is currently supported by all major browser
vendors.

Content-Security-Policy (CSP) has been proposed by the W3C Web
Application Security Working Group, with increasing support among
all major browser vendors, as a way to mitigate clickjacking and other
attacks. The 'frame-ancestors' policy directive restricts which
sources can embed the protected resource.

Note that while the X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy
response headers are not the only mitigations for clickjacking, they
are currently the most reliable methods that can be detected through
automation. Therefore, this plugin may produce false positives if
other mitigation strategies (e.g., frame-busting JavaScript) are
deployed or if the page does not perform any security-sensitive
transactions.
Solution:
Return the X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy (with the
'frame-ancestors' directive) HTTP header with the page's response.
This prevents the page's content from being rendered by another site
when using the frame or iframe HTML tags.

Name: mDNS Detection (Remote Network)
Synopsis: It is possible to obtain information about the remote host.
Description:
The remote service understands the Bonjour (also known as ZeroConf or
mDNS) protocol, which allows anyone to uncover information from the
remote host such as its operating system type and exact version, its
hostname, and the list of services it is running. 

This plugin attempts to discover mDNS used by hosts that are not on the
network segment on which Nessus resides.
Solution: Filter incoming traffic to UDP port 5353, if desired.

問題描述: Telnet伺服器以明文方式傳輸資料。 相關資訊：192.168.35.55:23。
建議解決方式: 建議遠端連線改為可提供加密連線的SSH。
Name: Unencrypted Telnet Server
Synopsis: The remote Telnet server transmits traffic in cleartext.
Description:
The remote host is running a Telnet server over an unencrypted
channel.

Using Telnet over an unencrypted channel is not recommended as logins,
passwords, and commands are transferred in cleartext. This allows a 
remote, man-in-the-middle attacker to eavesdrop on a Telnet session to
obtain credentials or other sensitive information and to modify
traffic exchanged between a client and server.

SSH is preferred over Telnet since it protects credentials from
eavesdropping and can tunnel additional data streams such as an X11
session.
Solution: Disable the Telnet service and use SSH instead.
Plugin Output:
Nessus collected the following banner from the remote Telnet server :

------------------------------ snip ------------------------------

RICOH Maintenance Shell.   
User access verification.
login:
------------------------------ snip ------------------------------

問題描述: SNMP服務會針對GETBULK請求回應大量資料。 相關資訊：192.168.35.55:161。
建議解決方式: 如不需使用建議關閉SNMP 服務，或變更public驗證字串以限制存取來源。
Name: SNMP 'GETBULK' Reflection DDoS
Synopsis:
The remote SNMP daemon is affected by a vulnerability that allows a
reflected distributed denial of service attack.
Description:
The remote SNMP daemon is responding with a large amount of data to a
'GETBULK' request with a larger than normal value for
'max-repetitions'. A remote attacker can use this SNMP server to
conduct a reflected distributed denial of service attack on an
arbitrary remote host.
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Otherwise, restrict and monitor access to this service, and consider
changing the default 'public' community string.
Plugin Output:
Nessus was able to determine the SNMP service can be abused in an SNMP
Reflection DDoS attack :

  Request size  (bytes) : 42
  Response size (bytes) : 1374

問題描述: 遠端網頁伺服器未在所有回應的標頭中，設定 X-Frame-Options 屬性，有點擊挾持(Clickjacking)的威脅，請參考：CWE:693。 相關資訊：192.168.36.200:80。
建議解決方式: 請於HTTP回傳的標頭增加X-Frame-Options項目，或於HTTP回傳的標頭增加Content-Security-Policy項目以及設定frame-ancestors值，此兩種方式皆可防止攻擊者將frame嵌入。
Name: Web Application Potentially Vulnerable to Clickjacking
Synopsis:
The remote web server may fail to mitigate a class of web application
vulnerabilities.
Description:
The remote web server does not set an X-Frame-Options response header
or a Content-Security-Policy 'frame-ancestors' response header in all
content responses. This could potentially expose the site to a
clickjacking or UI redress attack, in which an attacker can trick a
user into clicking an area of the vulnerable page that is different
than what the user perceives the page to be. This can result in a user
performing fraudulent or malicious transactions.

X-Frame-Options has been proposed by Microsoft as a way to mitigate
clickjacking attacks and is currently supported by all major browser
vendors.

Content-Security-Policy (CSP) has been proposed by the W3C Web
Application Security Working Group, with increasing support among
all major browser vendors, as a way to mitigate clickjacking and other
attacks. The 'frame-ancestors' policy directive restricts which
sources can embed the protected resource.

Note that while the X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy
response headers are not the only mitigations for clickjacking, they
are currently the most reliable methods that can be detected through
automation. Therefore, this plugin may produce false positives if
other mitigation strategies (e.g., frame-busting JavaScript) are
deployed or if the page does not perform any security-sensitive
transactions.
Solution:
Return the X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy (with the
'frame-ancestors' directive) HTTP header with the page's response.
This prevents the page's content from being rendered by another site
when using the frame or iframe HTML tags.
Plugin Output:
The following pages do not use a clickjacking mitigation response header and contain a clickable event :

  - http://192.168.36.200/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/aboutWim.cgi
  - http://192.168.36.200/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/authForm.cgi
  - http://192.168.36.200/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/header.cgi
  - http://192.168.36.200/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/topPage.cgi
  - http://192.168.36.200/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/waSearchFirst.cgi
  - http://192.168.36.200/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/waSearchResult.cgi

問題描述: 遠端主機運行mDNS (Multicast DNS)服務，有資訊洩漏的風險。 相關資訊：192.168.38.200:5353。
建議解決方式: 如果有需要可針對UDP Port 5353進入的流量進行過濾。
Name: mDNS Detection (Remote Network)
Synopsis: It is possible to obtain information about the remote host.
Description:
The remote service understands the Bonjour (also known as ZeroConf or
mDNS) protocol, which allows anyone to uncover information from the
remote host such as its operating system type and exact version, its
hostname, and the list of services it is running. 

This plugin attempts to discover mDNS used by hosts that are not on the
network segment on which Nessus resides.
Solution: Filter incoming traffic to UDP port 5353, if desired.

問題描述: 加密連線使用的數位憑證(Certificate)並不受到信任。這可能是因為伺服器提供無效的憑證或是簽署環節出現問題。 相關資訊：192.168.39.250:631。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證。
Name: SSL Certificate Cannot Be Trusted
Synopsis: The SSL certificate for this service cannot be trusted.
Description:
The server's X.509 certificate cannot be trusted. This situation can
occur in three different ways, in which the chain of trust can be
broken, as stated below :

  - First, the top of the certificate chain sent by the
    server might not be descended from a known public
    certificate authority. This can occur either when the
    top of the chain is an unrecognized, self-signed
    certificate, or when intermediate certificates are
    missing that would connect the top of the certificate
    chain to a known public certificate authority.

  - Second, the certificate chain may contain a certificate
    that is not valid at the time of the scan. This can
    occur either when the scan occurs before one of the
    certificate's 'notBefore' dates, or after one of the
    certificate's 'notAfter' dates.

  - Third, the certificate chain may contain a signature
    that either didn't match the certificate's information
    or could not be verified. Bad signatures can be fixed by
    getting the certificate with the bad signature to be
    re-signed by its issuer. Signatures that could not be
    verified are the result of the certificate's issuer
    using a signing algorithm that Nessus either does not
    support or does not recognize.

If the remote host is a public host in production, any break in the
chain makes it more difficult for users to verify the authenticity and 
identity of the web server. This could make it easier to carry out 
man-in-the-middle attacks against the remote host.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but it is signed by an unknown
certificate authority :

|-Subject : C=CountryName/ST=StateName/O=OrganizationName/OU=OrganizationUnit/CN=MFP13998779/E=user@mail.com/L=LocalityName
|-Issuer  : C=CountryName/ST=StateName/O=OrganizationName/OU=OrganizationUnit/CN=MFP13998779/E=user@mail.com/L=LocalityName

問題描述: 主機的數位憑證為自行簽署(Self_Signed)，而並非由公認之電子商務認證授權機構所發布。 相關資訊：192.168.39.250:631。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證，正式環境應使用公認之數位認證授權機構所發布的電子憑證。如內網需使用自簽憑證，建議自行架設Root CA來簽發憑證，並將Root CA的憑證匯入使用。(註：內網環境可依實際網路管控政策調整風險程度)
Name: SSL Self-Signed Certificate
Synopsis:
The SSL certificate chain for this service ends in an unrecognized
self-signed certificate.
Description:
The X.509 certificate chain for this service is not signed by a
recognized certificate authority.  If the remote host is a public host
in production, this nullifies the use of SSL as anyone could establish
a man-in-the-middle attack against the remote host. 

Note that this plugin does not check for certificate chains that end
in a certificate that is not self-signed, but is signed by an
unrecognized certificate authority.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was found at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but is self-signed and was not
found in the list of known certificate authorities :

|-Subject : C=CountryName/ST=StateName/O=OrganizationName/OU=OrganizationUnit/CN=MFP13998779/E=user@mail.com/L=LocalityName

問題描述: 遠端主機被偵測到支援TLSv 1.0的加密通訊協定。 相關資訊：192.168.40.249:443。
建議解決方式: 建議變更相關網路服務設定值，關閉TLS 1.0的支援，並開啟TLS 1.2、TLS 1.3之安全版本的協定。
Name: TLS Version 1.0 Protocol Detection
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.0. TLS 1.0 has a
number of cryptographic design flaws. Modern implementations of TLS 1.0
mitigate these problems, but newer versions of TLS like 1.2 and 1.3 are
designed against these flaws and should be used whenever possible.

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that arent enabled for TLS 1.2
and higher will no longer function properly with major web browsers and major vendors.

PCI DSS v3.2 requires that TLS 1.0 be disabled entirely by June 30,
2018, except for POS POI terminals (and the SSL/TLS termination
points to which they connect) that can be verified as not being
susceptible to any known exploits.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.0.
Plugin Output: TLSv1 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.

問題描述: 遠端服務使用較舊的 TLS 版本(TLS 1.1)加密傳輸的資料。 相關資訊：192.168.40.249:443。
建議解決方式: 啟用 TLS 1.2 與/或 1.3 支援，並停用 TLS 1.1 支援。
Name: TLS Version 1.1 Deprecated Protocol
Synopsis: The remote service encrypts traffic using an older version of TLS.
Description:
The remote service accepts connections encrypted using TLS 1.1. TLS 1.1 lacks support for current and recommended
cipher suites. Ciphers that support encryption before MAC computation, and authenticated encryption modes such as GCM
cannot be used with TLS 1.1

As of March 31, 2020, Endpoints that are not enabled for TLS 1.2 and higher will no longer function properly with major
web browsers and major vendors.
Solution: Enable support for TLS 1.2 and/or 1.3, and disable support for TLS 1.1.
Plugin Output: TLSv1.1 is enabled and the server supports at least one cipher.

問題描述: SNMP服務會針對GETBULK請求回應大量資料。 相關資訊：192.168.42.201:161。
建議解決方式: 如不需使用建議關閉SNMP 服務，或變更public驗證字串以限制存取來源。
Name: SNMP 'GETBULK' Reflection DDoS
Synopsis:
The remote SNMP daemon is affected by a vulnerability that allows a
reflected distributed denial of service attack.
Description:
The remote SNMP daemon is responding with a large amount of data to a
'GETBULK' request with a larger than normal value for
'max-repetitions'. A remote attacker can use this SNMP server to
conduct a reflected distributed denial of service attack on an
arbitrary remote host.
Solution:
Disable the SNMP service on the remote host if you do not use it.
Otherwise, restrict and monitor access to this service, and consider
changing the default 'public' community string.
Plugin Output:
Nessus was able to determine the SNMP service can be abused in an SNMP
Reflection DDoS attack :

  Request size  (bytes) : 42
  Response size (bytes) : 1386

問題描述: 遠端網頁伺服器未在所有回應的標頭中，設定 X-Frame-Options 屬性，有點擊挾持(Clickjacking)的威脅，請參考：CWE:693。 相關資訊：192.168.42.201:80。
建議解決方式: 請於HTTP回傳的標頭增加X-Frame-Options項目，或於HTTP回傳的標頭增加Content-Security-Policy項目以及設定frame-ancestors值，此兩種方式皆可防止攻擊者將frame嵌入。
Name: Web Application Potentially Vulnerable to Clickjacking
Synopsis:
The remote web server may fail to mitigate a class of web application
vulnerabilities.
Description:
The remote web server does not set an X-Frame-Options response header
or a Content-Security-Policy 'frame-ancestors' response header in all
content responses. This could potentially expose the site to a
clickjacking or UI redress attack, in which an attacker can trick a
user into clicking an area of the vulnerable page that is different
than what the user perceives the page to be. This can result in a user
performing fraudulent or malicious transactions.

X-Frame-Options has been proposed by Microsoft as a way to mitigate
clickjacking attacks and is currently supported by all major browser
vendors.

Content-Security-Policy (CSP) has been proposed by the W3C Web
Application Security Working Group, with increasing support among
all major browser vendors, as a way to mitigate clickjacking and other
attacks. The 'frame-ancestors' policy directive restricts which
sources can embed the protected resource.

Note that while the X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy
response headers are not the only mitigations for clickjacking, they
are currently the most reliable methods that can be detected through
automation. Therefore, this plugin may produce false positives if
other mitigation strategies (e.g., frame-busting JavaScript) are
deployed or if the page does not perform any security-sensitive
transactions.
Solution:
Return the X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy (with the
'frame-ancestors' directive) HTTP header with the page's response.
This prevents the page's content from being rendered by another site
when using the frame or iframe HTML tags.
Plugin Output:
The following pages do not use a clickjacking mitigation response header and contain a clickable event :

  - http://192.168.42.201/web/guest/tw/websys/webArch/topPage.cgi

問題描述: 加密連線使用的數位憑證(Certificate)並不受到信任。這可能是因為伺服器提供無效的憑證或是簽署環節出現問題。 相關資訊：192.168.43.50:80。
建議解決方式: 建議重新簽署新的數位憑證。
Name: SSL Certificate Cannot Be Trusted
Synopsis: The SSL certificate for this service cannot be trusted.
Description:
The server's X.509 certificate cannot be trusted. This situation can
occur in three different ways, in which the chain of trust can be
broken, as stated below :

  - First, the top of the certificate chain sent by the
    server might not be descended from a known public
    certificate authority. This can occur either when the
    top of the chain is an unrecognized, self-signed
    certificate, or when intermediate certificates are
    missing that would connect the top of the certificate
    chain to a known public certificate authority.

  - Second, the certificate chain may contain a certificate
    that is not valid at the time of the scan. This can
    occur either when the scan occurs before one of the
    certificate's 'notBefore' dates, or after one of the
    certificate's 'notAfter' dates.

  - Third, the certificate chain may contain a signature
    that either didn't match the certificate's information
    or could not be verified. Bad signatures can be fixed by
    getting the certificate with the bad signature to be
    re-signed by its issuer. Signatures that could not be
    verified are the result of the certificate's issuer
    using a signing algorithm that Nessus either does not
    support or does not recognize.

If the remote host is a public host in production, any break in the
chain makes it more difficult for users to verify the authenticity and 
identity of the web server. This could make it easier to carry out 
man-in-the-middle attacks against the remote host.
Solution: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.
Plugin Output:
The following certificate was at the top of the certificate
chain sent by the remote host, but it is signed by an unknown
certificate authority :

|-Subject : O=HP/OU=HP/CN=NPI569781/ST=STATE/L=HP/C=CN/E=NPI569781@NPI569781.Local
|-Issuer  : O=HP/OU=HP/CN=NPI569781/ST=STATE/L=HP/C=CN/E=NPI569781@NPI569781.Local
